title: This will be my last post on GD
body:
I can't use these new Reddit boards, they actually make my eyes feel strained and give me a headache, so GD. Until a lot changes, this is goodbye. Q_Q
{{champion:99}} Lux is Love
~Finales Funkeln

replies.body: FEK will have theme changes I'm sure, stick around m8.

Install fek!

In this case its better than health insurance with eye coverage
Liar, this is Board Feedback, not GD.
For once, I will sympathize with a mage.
I donno, its difficult to imagine a webpage causing serious health issues, though I see many people are supposedly straining their eyes. Also seems more like first world problems
